page.title: 08GLEBE HOUSE.
page.content: {GLEBE HOUSE}IS AN {OLD PEOPLES HOME.} IT WAS OPENED IN 1968 AND IS RUN BY { {DURHAM COUNTY COUNCIL.}THERE ARE 10 MEN AND 32 WOMEN LIVING THERE.THE ELDEST IS A WOMAN,{99 YEARS OLD.}ON THE STAFF ARE 25 WOMEN AND ONLY ONE MAN.HE IS CARETAKER AND GARDENER.THE WOMEN LOOK AFTER THE OLD PEOPLE.A { {HAIRDRESSER }COMES ONCE A WEEK .SOME PEOPLE SHARE A BEDROOM.SOME HAVE THEIR OWN.THEY HAVE TO PAY TO STAY IN THE HOME.THERE IS A{LOUNGE}FOR EVERYONE TO USE.TO KEEP THEM OCCUPIED THE PEOPLE WATCH TELEVISION,PLAY BINGO,READ AND LISTEN TO MUSIC.THOSE WHO ARE NOT ILL CAN GO OUT WHEN THEY WANT TO.THE OLD PEOPLE{LIKED EVERTHING}ABOUT THE HOME AND SAID IT WAS A{NICE PLACE}TO LIVE.
